Hi Curran, yes, I am curious if it is under priced, or at about it's 
value ?????. It is a wonderful looking piece and I would love to see it 
in hand.

Rich



Curran Campbell wrote:
> Rich,
>
> It is a beautiful example with Juyo papers. I don't
> know if the estimate is right, but I liked it much.
>    A few years of observing the Christies March
> Madness Japanese sale has left me with the impression
> they overprice some of the items and underprice
> others. If someone has the resluts from last year's
> sale, maybe they can comment on how the Juyo pieces
> did last year.
>
> I thought the estimates on some of the other tsuba
> lots were a bit low, but then many contained signed
> pieces without papers. Wish I could go up and see them
> in person, but can't find the time to this year.
>
> Curran
>
>   
>
